# Key Code Example

```{python}
# Import Libraries
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Scrape sample data
url = "https://example.com"
html_content = "<html><body><table><tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr><tr><td>Apples</td><td>10</td></tr><tr><td>Oranges</td><td>15</td></tr></table></body></html>"
soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, "html.parser")

# Parse table into DataFrame
table = soup.find("table")
rows = table.find_all("tr")
data = []
for row in rows[1:]:
    cols = row.find_all("td")
    data.append([col.text for col in cols])

df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["Item", "Value"])
df["Value"] = df["Value"].astype(int)

# Show DataFrame
print(df)

# Visualization
plt.bar(df["Item"], df["Value"], color=["green", "orange"])
plt.title("Sample Scraped Data Visualization")
plt.xlabel("Item")
plt.ylabel("Value")
plt.grid(axis="y")
plt.show()
```
